oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What Maidens (and young men) must not say or do, to avoid the wrath of the Water. By Dia!kwain (L V.-6. 4377 rev.-4407 rev.). Girls and youths and the rain: what they are taught and what they must do, eat and avoid.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Things girls and youths must avoid (the rain's things)
